plot outline: August Club since 1969 is a Malayalam romantic drama directed by K. B. Venu. Rima Kallingal stars in the story about the nuances in marital life. Savithri is a young happily married housewife and an uncrowned chess champion in a nearby local club. Surprisingly, is defeated in a game of chess by a newcomer at the club. They get engaged in an emotional game of music and poetry while playing chess.
title: August Club
plot: _August Club_ (qv) since 1969 is a Malayalam romantic drama directed by K. B. Venu. Rima Kallingal stars in the story about the nuances in marital life. Savithri is a young happily married housewife and an uncrowned chess champion in a nearby local club. Surprisingly, is defeated in a game of chess by a newcomer at the club. They get engaged in an emotional game of music and poetry while playing chess.
